before and the finished blanket blended right into the room © 2023 william sexton 3 chevron temperature blanket pattern gauge i highly recommended that you crochet a gauge swatch crochet 15 row in pattern and it should measure about 3 ¾ in both dimensions as shown in the picture adjust your hook size or gauge until you match this gauge i am using a larger hook than what is called for on the truboo label there are two reasons why 1 the single_crochet through the back loop creates a very dense fabric and a larger hook improves the drape and 2 truboo tends to be a little splitty and a larger hook loosens up your gauge abbreviations this pattern uses us crochet terms abbreviation meaning single_crochet single_crochet as normal through both loops blsc single_crochet through the back loop only chain chain instructions monthly strips for each month you will need to crochet a strip 1 chain 26 in the second stitch from the hook single_crochet skip 1 chain 10 single_crochet
